channel.description: Recent content in ads on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-16
item.description: Twitter makes big changes for devs as it eyes decentralized future (4 minute read) Twitter’s new API is ready to come out of early access.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-03
item.description: Microsoft Teams enters the metaverse race with 3D avatars and immersive meetings (4 minute read) Microsoft is integrating Mesh directly into Microsoft Teams.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-18
item.description: Amazon is expanding Amazon Care telehealth service nationally for its employees and other companies (3 minute read) Amazon Care is rolling out for Amazon employees in all 50 states starting this summer.
